summary: The customer was considering purchasing Contoso Wireless' streaming product and asked the agent for more information. The agent provided details about the quality of the stream, the different tiers of service available, the features included with each tier, and additional features such as personalized recommendations and parental control settings. The agent also informed the customer about their 30-day money back guarantee and 24/7 customer support. The customer was satisfied with this information and decided to make their purchase.
